tool_description: Dungy Amazon Data Scraper is the easiest way to get access to price, sales rank, and data reviews from Amazon in JSON Format
name: Dungy Amazon Data Scraper
title: Dungy Amazon Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dungy-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/B08N5R2GQW"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dungy-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dungy-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dungy-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
